content.text:
# List of Democratic Republic of the Congo singers

This is a list of Congolese singers.
A
* Cor Akim
B
* Céline Banza
* Patsha Bay
* M'bilia Bel
* Gibson Butukondolo
C
* Cindy Le Coeur

* Lucie Eyenga

* Lokua Kanza
* Kaysha
* Josky Kiambukuta
* Wendo Kolosoy

* N'Yoka Longo
* Awilo Longomba
* Vicky Longomba
* Malage de Lugendo

* Nathalie Makoma

* Marie Misamu
* Madilu System
* Réjane Magloire
